p: Linear rosin-modified cationic poly(acrylamide) can be prepared from dehydroabietyl chloride, bromopropan-1-ol, methyldiallylamine, acrylamide and diallyl dimethyl ammonium chloride in a few-step process, according to Scheme 70, followed by operations such as filtration, washing, drying and recrystallization [ 149]. Its utilization may be in flocculation processes [ 149].
